CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Visit Product Page stage positioned above or below the View Advertisement stage?
SRP.A: The Visit Product Page stage is positioned {below} the View Advertisement stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {2403}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Wishlist?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Wishlist is {2941}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete Purchase is {744}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Advertisement, with a value of {6567}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Purchase, with a value of {744}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {117} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {538} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Advertisement to stage Visit Product Page?
SC.A: Decreased by {2004} Users from stage View Advertisement to stage Visit Product Page.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2672? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Advertisement} stage has {6567}, the {Visit Product Page} stage has {4563}, the {Add to Wishlist} stage has {2941}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1914? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initiate Checkout} stage has {1425}, the {Enter Payment Information} stage has {861}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {744}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1914 and 2672? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to {Initiate Checkout} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page, from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Advertisement} to stage {Visit Product Page} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Advertisement} and {Visit Product Page} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
